inclusion.criterion: Recent experience of an acute burn, injury, or surgery meeting the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual(DSM-IV) A1 stressor criterion
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Child's response to the stressor meets Diagnostic and Statistical Manual(DSM-IV) A2 response criterion
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Proficiency in either English or Spanish
inclusion.label: met

notes: A 54-year-old woman with abnormal cervical squamous intraepithelial/glandular lesion and HPV 16 positivity. She smokes and drinks alcohol frequently.
